name: Mononeko
storyline: Every day, the streets witness a growing number of abandoned cats. Embark on a heartfelt odyssey and embody the spirits of these cats to confront humans with the consequences of their neglect, exposing a grim mystery behind the feline abandonment and mistreatment, and ignite a spark of change in your pursuit of retribution.
summary: In Mononeko, you weave attacks into the music, chain together movements and race against time to capture the kitten killers who are hiding a dark truth. It’s a quest for justice, set to the beat of your bravery.
